page.title: 10WINCANTON C.P. SCHOOL
page.content: { Extra Curricular activities}range from sports to music, to computers and chess. The{country dancing}club joins dancers from Somerset schools{at Wells for dancing on the{cathedral}green.The Rose King and Queen were crowned at the{Midsummer Revels,}where there were Maypole, Morris and Country dances. The first part of the{Spring Concert was an Old Time Music Hall,the second Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs. All of the school's 330 children took part We entered the first{Somerset Science {Fair.}We won first prize with a junkmobile, and a second with a timer. Each class goes on{educational visits The 4th year juniors spent a week doing environmental studies while on a residential{camp}at{Lyme Regis. { Christmas}carol singing around the tree on the playground was planned but the wet weather forced us indoors.
